---
title: "Dependencies"
---

Installation of imlui on Linux and MacOS requires a set of libraries to be available on your system. The names of the required libraries depend on the used package manager. Below you can see a list of supported package managers:

| PM   | OS                   |
| ---- | -------------------- |
| deb  | Debian, Ubuntu, Mint |
| rpm  | Fedora, Amazon Linux |
| brew | MacOS                |

The required set of installation commands for each package manager is shown in the following:

```bash
# deb
sudo apt update
sudo apt install -y libpq-dev libssl-dev libsodium-dev

# rpm
sudo yum update
sudo yum install -y postgresql-devel openssl-devel libsodium-devel

# brew
brew install libpq openssl libsodium
```
